<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"triggerFlow"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/v1/environment/{environment}/flows/{flow}/trigger"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Trigger a [Flow](https://docs.ganymede.bio/app/flows/FlowEditor#flows) in an Environment.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"environment","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"flow","required":true,"in":"path","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"flowInputs":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"task":{"type":"string"},"param":{"type":"string"},"value":{"type":"string"},"dataType":{"type":"string"}},"required":["task","param","value","dataType"],"title":"FlowInput"}},"dry_run":{"type":"boolean","description":"If true, perform a dry run without actually triggering the flow"}},"required":["flowInputs"],"title":"TriggerFlowBody"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"flowRunId","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"201":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}},"422":{"description":"Inputs to flow are invalid or missing","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"string"}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
